attributes.title: GAVIN IN THE VOID - #630

attributes.title: Everyone's Favorite Movie - #631
attributes.caption: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Drew Saplin, and Barbara Dunkelman as they discuss everyone's favorite movie which is not the Son of the Mask. They also talk about Jim Carrey's movies coming out like the same year. He had a lot of work. Isn't that crazy?
attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Drew Saplin, and Barbara Dunkelman as they discuss everyone's favorite movie which is not the Son of the Mask. They also talk about Jim Carrey's movies coming out like the same year. He had a lot of work. Isn't that crazy? Then he did Cable Man or whatever. Cable Guy? Cable Man I think. Whatever.

attributes.title: Gus's Bad Omen for 2021 - #632
attributes.caption: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Jon Risinger, and Barbara Dunkelman as they discuss Gus's bad omen where he does a nice stretch and pulls his back. I don't know how that bodes for the rest of us though. That sounds like a bad omen specifically for Gus.
attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Jon Risinger, and Barbara Dunkelman as they discuss Gus's bad omen where he does a nice stretch and pulls his back. I don't know how that bodes for the rest of us though. That sounds like a bad omen specifically for Gus. So far my year is alright. I hope yours is ok too. Gavin refuses to make any 2021 predictions.

attributes.title: Blaine is a Bad Gift Giver? - #633

attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Blaine Gibson, and Barbara Dunkelman as they discuss the end of Flash and their content but a public train system in China got messed up because of it. How did a train run on flash? I thought they ran on coal and someone had to shovel it in?

attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Barbara Dunkelman, and Cole Gallian as they discuss the Survivor reality show, Flight Attendants, and what the best disguise for an alien would be. I already know what the best disguise for an alien is, and his name is ERIC BAUDOUR. You think he can just be a rat, watch wrestling, and be all little? No way sister. Not fooling me for a second. I’m onto you.

attributes.title: Remember When It Snowed? - #640

attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Gavin Free, Andrew Rosas, and Barbara Dunkelman as they discuss the frozen tundra we were in like a month ago and how much has changed. It's crazy. It was like 85 out today. It was killer. I worked in the backyard for like 3 or 4 hours today. Not bad.

attributes.description: Join Gus Sorola, Geoff Ramsey, and Barbara Dunkelman as Gus talks about his experience playing the Stardew Valley board game. That's like having a Doom board game. I was on it but when you're on the show, it's kind of this "zero retention" thing where it all happens but you remember none of it. I think we talked about the color green for a little bit? I'm sorry.

attributes.description: Join Barbara Dunkelman, Eric Baudour, Jessica Vasami, and Geoff Ramsey as they discuss the impact of social media on their day to day lives. It's a lot. They kind of get in to it at the end like in a more tête-à-tête way, you know? It's a pretty healthy discussion. Everyone makes salient points. The thing they all agree on is to stop hate scrolling. Why are you doing it? Stop.
